abstract: When adjusted for that sale and other divestments, however, the Finnish company reported a net loss of 26 million euros in the second quarter.
snippet: When adjusted for that sale and other divestments, however, the Finnish company reported a net loss of 26 million euros in the second quarter.
lead_paragraph: LONDON — The Finnish telecom company Nokia reported a jump in profit in the second quarter as it benefited from the recent sale of its handset unit to Microsoft for $7.3 billion.

headline.main: Sale of Handset Unit Bolsters Nokia’s Profit
headline.print_headline: Nokia Reports Profit Gains Brought by Sale to Microsoft
